LLToast.message: This profile requires the BotBase Lisbeth to run.
Please make sure Lisbeth is installed correctly before proceeding.

UserDialog.DialogText: You do not have any Stadium quests set to 1.\nPlease open the profile and change at least one of the five to 1.
You have Carpenter/Leatherworker/Weaver quest selected, but no class selected to do them on.\nPlease open the profile and change one of the three to 1.
You have Blacksmith/Armorer/Goldsmith quest selected, but no class selected to do them on.\nPlease open the profile and change one of the three to 1.
You have Alchemist/Culinarian quest selected, but no class selected to do them on.\nPlease open the profile and change one of the two to 1.
You have Alchemist/Culinarian quest selected, but no class selected to do them on.\nPlease open the profile and change one of the two to 1.
